about_the_game:
Experience Albert’s Ark Idle, an idle/clicker adventure filled with magical minigames and exciting activities! Gather money by clicking your castle, playing minigames, buying and upgrading buildings, and restore magic to the kingdom while you go on fun adventures!


Fishing, Fusions and Food

Use the power of Creature Essence to unlock minigames. Grow vegetables at the farm to gain a variety of buffs, or use the harbor to explore the Seven Seas with Albert and come back with huge treasures.


Revive Mythical Creatures

After acquiring Creature Essence from adventures, use it to revive several mythological creatures from all over the world, who will help you with your tasks. Harness the strength of the Bigfoot, the grace of the Unicorn, and the whimsical magical powers of the Fairy to enhance your adventures and boost your clicks.


Restore Magic

Through hard work and the help of your mystical friends, return magic to the world, which will bring changes to the island with new visuals and also give a boost to your income.


Invest and Grow the Kingdom!

Upgrade and develop your buildings and watch as they visually change to bigger and more impressive structures!


Pirates! AHOY!

Jealous and greedy pirates will “visit” you to take your riches. Prepare your defenses or click away the bombs they throw at you to stop them, keeping your island safe from their pillaging schemes... for a time.


Ascend and Power Up!

Use this power to restart a run and get powerful buffs for your next playthrough! Choose your path, craft your destiny, and ascend to greatness in the world of Albert’s Ark Idle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
  • Storage: 230 MB available space

short_description: Albert’s Ark Idle is a 2D clicker/idle game filled with exciting adventures! Buy and upgrade buildings, play minigames, make money, sail the seven seas and revive fantastic mythical creatures to bring magic back to the world.
